requirements.summary: Increase the logo size in the AppLayout header component beyond the current dimensions to make it even more prominent and visible
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in AppLayout header is noticeably larger than the previous increase
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and visual quality
Logo size is appropriate for the header layout without causing overflow or misalignment
Change is visible on both desktop and mobile viewports

file_operations.description: Increase the logo image dimensions in the header section by modifying the width and height attributes or CSS classes. Ensure the logo uses workspace path 'frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_400x200.png' or 'frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-rotas-e-direitos.dim_512x512.png' depending on which is currently used. Adjust surrounding header spacing if needed to accommodate the larger logo without causing layout issues. Test responsiveness across desktop and mobile viewports to ensure the logo scales appropriately.
